content.rendered:
Capricorn

  • Dates: December 22 – January 19
  • Element: Earth
  • Symbol: Sea goat

You are hardworking, and won’t let anything stop you from climbing to the top. Your horoscope says to combine the old with the new for a more successful year, and we have the perfect adventure to help you do just that.  Our Upper Clear Creek rafting trip is one of our original activities and our via ferrata is just coming to the front of the Colorado adventure scene. You element, earth, is highly connected to the senses and we will be appealing to all of your senses with these 2 activities. You symbol, the sea goat can navigate rough mountain terrain as well as the depths of the ocean, so a climbing + rafting trip is perfect for Capricorns.

Adventure: Upper Clear Creek + Via Ferrata

Location: Idaho Springs, Colorado

Start your 2020 adventure with an exciting morning of class IV rapids and tap into your inner sea goat and enjoy one of the oldest adventures in Colorado. In the afternoon, you will embark on our newest adventure the via ferrata. Again, the sea goat will come into play as you need to navigate the cliffside through traversing, climbing, ziplining and more.

Aquarius

  • Dates: January 20 – February 18
  • Element: Air
  • Symbol: Water-bearer

The new year is full of changes and challenges, but you are ready to do everything you can to overcome them. It is time to prepare yourself for inner battles, and make sure you have a clear head heading into the year. It avoid any self-destruction, we recommend you hear to the Blue River. Allow the flow of energy from the Blue River to give you the breath of fresh air that you need. The water bearer washes away the past and leaves you looking forward and ready for a fresh start. The Blue River Express adventure is exactly what you need to get you started on your newest journey. 

Adventure: The Blue River Express

Location: Silverthorne, Colorado

The Blue River is beautiful and calming but you will splash away all of those negative thoughts and enjoy a fun ride down the river. You will be surrounded by beautiful peaks as you travel through the gorgeous Blue River valley. This trip will give you the spirit you need to fuel your future with a clear head and open heart.

Pisces

  • Dates: February 19 – March 20
  • Element: Water
  • Symbol: Fish

This year you need to pay particularly close attention to your intuition and ambition. This will give you the clear path to what you truly want this year. Don’t forget to take time to breath and enjoy your surroundings. You element, water, can be tied to emotion and getting in touch with yourself while your symbol the fish can represent the division of your attention between fantasy and reality. There is no better place to trust your intuition than on a fishing trip. We think fly fishing will give you the time and energy you need to create your path for the year. 

Adventure: Fly Fishing Float Trip

Location: Kremmling, Colorado

The true greatness of fly fishing doesn’t come from catching the biggest fish, but measured by the memories made from spending time on the water. Fly fishing has the ability to impact lives through taking time to find ourselves. Spend the day floating through the beautiful Colorado River learning a relaxing skill or sharpening the skill that you already have. You can let your imagination run wild, and be brought back to reality by that slight tug on your fishing rod.

Aries

  • Dates: March 21 – April 19
  • Element: Fire
  • Symbol: Ram

Your 2020 horoscope shows that you are ready for all challenges that come your way, and you have the determination to conquer the world. We are not looking past your fire element which tells us that you approach every challenge with intuition, big passion, and spontaneity. Your symbol the ram is a determined creature that is full of energy and determined to conquer anything that is thrown its way. Your 2020 adventure is the Rappel into the Gauntlet because this trip is not for the faint of heart and is perfect those with high energy and passion. 

Adventure: Rappel into the Gauntlet

Location: Buena Vista, Colorado

This trip is for those that are already physically active and ready to challenge themselves, so that is why it is perfect for aries. You’ll get your adrenaline flowing with a rappel into the Granite Gorge, where you’ll meet your raft for The Gauntlet – rafting Pine Creek & The Numbers. You’ll launch into the most advanced rafting offered on the Arkansas River in Colorado. The Gauntlet is full of Class III-V rapids and is the steepest and most continuous whitewater on the Arkansas River. Ready, set, paddle!

Taurus

  • Dates: April 20 – May 20
  • Element: Earth
  • Symbol: Bull

Your 2020 horoscope tells us that you love the good life,  and you have great accomplishments to come. Your love for beautiful things brings you the balance you need in life as you focus on your drive to succeed. Your element describes you as practical, stoic, and your symbol shows that you are determined, and ambitious. These are the qualities you are going to need to succeed on a stand up paddle board on the Colorado River. This adventure is perfect for the Taurus because you need the drive to tackle the Colorado solo on a paddle board, but also the appreciation of the beautiful landscape around you. 

Adventure: Stand Up Paddle Board on the Upper Colorado River

Location: Kremmling, Colorado

This trip is a combination of soaking in undeniable beauty of the Colorado River Valley and hard work to paddle board through rapids. On this half day trip you’ll SUP 5 miles down the Colorado River. You’ll stand up or kneel on a large, surfboard-shaped board and steer with a long paddle as you navigate down the river. This section of the Upper Colorado River through Little Gore Canyon is the perfect spot to test your abilities with this adventure.

Gemini

  • Dates: May 21 – June 20
  • Element: Air
  • Symbol: Twin

Your 2020 horoscope shows that you will connect with yourself and others on a higher level this year. As you express wonder and curiosity, it will take you to new places that you will face with enthusiasm. Air represents your intellectual and communication skills while twin is the sign of duality and opposing forces. Your adventure jumps right out at us as the Mount Evans Via Ferrata that will have you traversing the cliffside against gravity and racing down our dual zipline. Your communication skills will be used throughout but you will need to tap into your air element as you rappel down the cliff connected to our guide. 

Adventure: Mount Evans Via Ferrata

Location: Idaho Springs, Colorado

The Mount Evans Via Ferrata is a newer and more extreme adventure. Via Ferrata, which means “iron way”, is a method of mountaineering & rock climbing through use of ladders, rungs, rails, cables and bridges to aid in moving across and up a cliff face. We add multiple ziplines into our adventure too! You will clip into cables that run along the side of a cliff. They then move along the designated path while being connected to the cable of the course at all times.

Cancer

  • Date: June 21 – July 22
  • Element: Water
  • Symbol: Crab

According to your horoscope, 2020 is your year to recharge and practice self care. Your empathy for those close to you as well as strangers shines through in everything you do. This is your year to focus on yourself, and we have the perfect adventure to help you do that. Browns Canyon Sizzler is perfect for those with the water element because just like you it is a refreshing trip that will allow you to explore the depth of this national monument. The crab symbolizes self-sufficient behavior and confidence that you are on the right path, so trust your intuition and go on an adventure this year. 

Adventure: Browns Canyon Sizzler + Cabin

Location: Buena Vista, Colorado

This is a great trip to enjoy with loved ones or tackle it solo and really tap into your emotions as you raft through the National Monument Browns Canyon. You will discover beauty through the Arkansas River Valley, and you will have to trust yourself as you paddle through class III rapids. After your trip, spend a night in nature in the cabin and rejuvenate, so you will be ready for your next calling.

Leo

  • Dates: July 23 – August 22
  • Element: Fire
  • Symbol: Lion 

Your outgoing and playful personality is paired with the traits of a lion that loves to roam free. You’re a natural born leader, but you shave continued to work hard your whole life. Your horoscope shows that you are respected and admired and you crave strong reactions, and that is why you need to play in the back country of Colorado on a UTV. Your fire element brings you the energy you need to explore far and wide, and not to mention your love for speed. 

Adventure: UTV Full Day Rental

Location: Kremmling, Colorado

This is the perfect adventure for Leos because you get to play into your fun and spontaneous nature with off-roading, but you will feel free. We recommend exploring until you find the perfect place to reflect and enjoy a few moments of peace and quiet before ripping through more trails. You will…

Virgo

  • Dates: August 23 – September 22
  • Element: Earth
  • Symbol: Maiden

Your horoscope shows 2020 as fast paced and full of social interactions. While you enjoy and take on this lifestyle, you must take care of your mind and body. As the maiden originally symbolized modest it is now considered self sufficient which you will need to be for this next adventure. You are grounded with a clear sense of purpose and you continue to make observations to make confident decisions. We would only recommend this next trip to someone who is self sufficient and confident because you will tackle some of the toughest whitewater in the state.

Adventure: Phoenix Full Day Rafting Trip

Location: Idaho Springs, Colorado

The Phoenix full day rafting trip will take you through class III – class V rafting. While you wouldn’t brag about going down class V whitewater, you are just the person who can keep calm through the fast paced river. There is nothing like getting splashed with cold water while paddling down a beautiful canyon to help you clear your mind and get your body on the right track. Don’t worry its not all business, you will get plenty of time to socialize river side while you enjoy lunch.

Libra

  • Dates: September 23 – October 22
  • Element: Air
  • Symbol: Scales

Your 2020 horoscope shows a dreamy year with flows of love. If that isn’t enough, you will also be looked up to by others for the standard that they want to live their lives by. You are a breath of fresh air, and the possessor of the virtue of knowledge. Your symbol scales represents balance, equality, justice and harmony. Our trip that is full of balance, fresh air, and knowledge would be the Cliffside Zipline + Gold Rush Rafting adventure. 

Adventure: Cliffside Zipline + Gold Rush Package

Location: Idaho Springs, Colorado

You are just the person to embark on this full day adventure in the beautiful Clear Creek Canyon. Start by flying high through the trees over the river, and then flow through Clear Creek past the historic Argo Mine. Your guides will pass along knowledge for you to share, and this trip will bring the perfect harmony you need with 2 very different activities.

 

Scorpio

  • Dates: October 23 – November 21
  • Element: Water
  • Symbols: Scorpion, Eagle and Phoenix

You are confident, adventurous and knowledge seeking, and you really pack a punch when you team up with someone. While Scorpios have three different symbols, there element represents intuition, imagination and a free flowing spirit. Scorpios have three different symbols, and each one represents a different totem on scorpion. The first is the scorpion which symbolizes dominance, defense and transformation. The eagle symbol is known for its eye sign and ability to release from bondage (or when it comes to rafting release from rocks). The final symbol is the phoenix which is the ultimate representation of strength. No matter which symbol you fall under, you are up for a challenge and that is why your 2020 horoscope adventure is the Numbers Wyldride Adventure. 

Adventure: The Numbers Wyldride

Location: Buena Vista, Colorado

The Numbers Wyldride is our only rafting trip where you will pair up with one other person and your guide will take you down a face paced, tough section of the Arkansas River called the Numbers. Since you can truly pack a punch when you team up with someone, then you will be able to handle this high energetic rafting trip. You, your partner and your guide will dominate this class IV section and be ready to tell the tail once you’ve completed the challenge.

Sagittarius

  • Dates: November 22 – December 21
  • Element: Fire
  • Symbol: Archer

Your outgoing adventurous nature is backed by your powerful fuel for success. In 2020, you will make your own luck by working hard and shaping your future with focus on the present moment. It is your time to leave the past in the past, and amplify your present by taking action in your life, and in your community. Your element represents energy that needs to be controlled and harnessed on your passions. The archer represents cool thinking in heated situations which you will use on the wild portion of your adventure. You have the symbol of precision, patience and honor, and your 2020 adventure is the 3 Day Mild to Wild Adventure. 

Adventure: 3 Day Mild to Wild Overnight Adventure

Location: Buena Vista, Colorado

This trip is the ultimate adventure in Colorado, and is perfect for someone who is looking to live in the moment and honor what their live needs right now. You will spend 3 days on the river and you will start with the more mild portion of the trip through beautiful browns canyon. This is the perfect time to reflect on your past and look forward to your future. As the trip gets more wild, you will need to harness your energy and keep your cool through class IV and V river sections. You will go back into your every day life ready to tackle anything that you or your community throws at you.
